title: Alain de Botton on A THERAPEUTIC JOURNEY
description:
Our new book, A Therapeutic Journey, is a collection of the very best ideas from this channel. 
To order your copy of A Therapeutic Journey, click on this link now: https://b4f4.short.gy/1jtiiJ

Join this channel to get access to exclusive members perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7IcJI8PUf5Z3zKxnZvTBog/join


This talk was hosted by How To Academy London’s home of big thinking. Find out more about their live programme of talks, conversations and debates with leading authors, artists, scientists and scholars at http:www.howtoacademy.com, and follow their biweekly podcast on Apple, Spotify, or wherever you get your podcasts.
